name: Radha Krishnan
message: Hi, I'm interested in getting a custom bridal lehenga designed. I saw your work online and I'm impressed! Could you please provide information about the customization process, timeline, and pricing? I'm planning my wedding for next March.

name: Sanjana Nair
message: I absolutely love the contemporary floral saree border work shown in your gallery. Would it be possible to get something similar but in a different color scheme? I'm looking for emerald green with gold thread work. Please let me know if this is possible.

name: Aisha Mohammed
message: Hello! I recently purchased the minimalist white kurta from your collection and I must say the quality is outstanding. I'm interested in ordering two more pieces in different colors. Do you offer bulk discounts? Also, what's the typical delivery time?

name: Deepika Verma
message: I'm planning to open a boutique and I'm very interested in your work. Would you be open to discussing a potential business collaboration? I'd love to feature your aari embroidery pieces in my store. Looking forward to hearing from you.

name: Pooja Reddy
message: Can you create peacock motif designs on a navy blue blouse piece? I have the fabric ready. I need it completed within 3 weeks for an upcoming function. Please let me know if this timeline works for you and what the cost would be.
